{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Fleet Master Okaya |image = Portrait Fleetmaster Okaya Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Fleet Master Okaya.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Coastal |gender = Female |culture = [Rauatai](/rauatai/) |background = |faction = [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) |deity = |personality = |class = Fighter |level = 15 |MIG = 17 |CON = 15 |DEX = 13 |PER = 12 |INT = 11 |RES = 10 |health = 263 |damage = 22-32 {{pierce}} |accuracy = 93 |penetration = 10 |deflection = 67 |fortitude = 86 |reflex = 72 |will = 59 |dr = 7 |dr pierce = 5 |dr corrode = 5 |ability = [Towering Physique](/toweringPhysiqueDeadfire/), [Constant Recovery](/constantRecoveryDeadfire/), [Knock Down](/knockDownDeadfire/), [Cleaving Stance](/cleavingStance/), [Defender Stance](/defenderStance/), [Determination](/determination/), [Hold the Line](/holdTheLineDeadfire/), [Tactical Barrage](/tacticalBarrage/), [Body Control](/bodyControlDeadfire/), [Armored Grace](/armoredGraceDeadfire/), [Conquerer Stance](/conquererStance/), [Reaping the Whirlwind](/reapingTheWhirlwind/), [Refreshing Defense](/refreshingDefense/), [Power Strike](/powerStrike/), [Unbending Trunk](/unbendingTrunk/) |location = [Sayuka](/sayuka/), [Fleet Master's Quarters](/fleetMastersQuarters/) |quests = [A Matter of Import](/aMatterOfImport/)
[Overgrowth](/overgrowth/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [Spyglass](/spyglass/), [Letter to Home](/letterToHome/) |body = Rauatai Scale Armor |weapon1 = Superb Spear (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Spear |internalname = NPC_fleet_master_okaya |guid = 4801925f-48cd-4bbd-9b42-b823260c1a0b }} '''Fleet Master Okaya''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|Fleet Master Okaya stares with unwavering intensity at the small sea of papers strewn across her desk. She holds a pencil lightly in one hand and absently taps the tip of it against her lips. After a moment, a low hum escapes her throat. The sound ends with a harsh scoff, then she flicks her eyes to meet yours.}} Okaya is the youngest Rauataian in history to hold the title, a valedictorian of the naval academy in [Takowa](/takowa/), and a brilliant engineer altogether, trying to crack the mystery of Ondra's Mortar and the reason why everything on Sayuka grows so large. Okaya was drawn to academic work by a lifelong interest in mechanics and engineering, and nudged towards attending the Academy and joining the Navy by [Karū](/hazanuiKaru/), for whom she also has a weak spot. Despite the importance of her posting, she still misses the wind-swept rough country - but rationally knows this is where the work is done and where she's needed. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [Overgrowth](/overgrowth/) |quests_involved = [A Matter of Import](/aMatterOfImport/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [A Matter of Import](/aMatterOfImport/): You report to her at the end of the quest. * [Overgrowth](/overgrowth/): She asks you to investigate the strange overgrowth and find the source of it. [Category:Sayuka characters](/categorySayukaCharacters/)

[[Overgrowth]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [[Spyglass]], [[Letter to Home]] |body = Rauatai Scale Armor |weapon1 = Superb Spear (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Spear |internalname = NPC_fleet_master_okaya |guid = 4801925f-48cd-4bbd-9b42-b823260c1a0b }} '''Fleet Master Okaya''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|Fleet Master Okaya stares with unwavering intensity at the small sea of papers strewn across her desk. She holds a pencil lightly in one hand and absently taps the tip of it against her lips. After a moment, a low hum escapes her throat. The sound ends with a harsh scoff, then she flicks her eyes to meet yours.}} Okaya is the youngest Rauataian in history to hold the title, a valedictorian of the naval academy in [[Takowa]], and a brilliant engineer altogether, trying to crack the mystery of Ondra's Mortar and the reason why everything on Sayuka grows so large. Okaya was drawn to academic work by a lifelong interest in mechanics and engineering, and nudged towards attending the Academy and joining the Navy by [[Hazanui Karū|Karū]], for whom she also has a weak spot. Despite the importance of her posting, she still misses the wind-swept rough country - but rationally knows this is where the work is done and where she's needed. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [[Overgrowth]] |quests_involved = [[A Matter of Import]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[A Matter of Import]]: You report to her at the end of the quest. * [[Overgrowth]]: She asks you to investigate the strange overgrowth and find the source of it. title: Fleet Master Okaya
